hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Spirit Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #1# major item.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Water Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Serenade of Water#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: A broken stick is just as good as a Master Sword. Who knew?

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Gerudo Card#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #2# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #the Giant's Knife#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: Have you embraced the power of the Deku Nut yet?

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Blue Rupee#.
